prompt: Add Ralph Wiggum controls and container monitoring to control-center.html dashboard. Create 'Ralph Controls' section with: (1) Range sliders for RALPH_MAX_ITERATIONS_SIMPLE (5-20), MEDIUM (15-40), COMPLEX (30-70) with current values displayed, (2) Toggle switch for RALPH_ADAPTIVE_ITERATIONS, (3) 'Apply Settings' button that calls POST /api/ralph/config. Create API endpoints in dashboard/backend/api/routes/aistack.py: POST /api/ralph/config to update ~/.config/nixos-ai-stack/.env and restart Ralph container, GET /api/containers/health to fetch all container status (name, state, health, uptime, errors). Add 'Container Health' grid showing service cards with status badges (green/yellow/red). Integrate Chart.js for live telemetry visualization (task completion rate, iteration distribution). Add WebSocket updates for real-time status. Style with existing dashboard theme.

context.purpose: Real-time control and observability for operators
